org.apache.spark.scheduler

Interface SparkListenerBus

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ListenerBus<SparkListener,SparkListenerEvent>, Logging
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LiveListenerBus, ReplayListenerBus

    public interface SparkListenerBus
extends ListenerBus<SparkListener,SparkListenerEvent>
    A SparkListenerEvent bus that relays SparkListenerEvents to its listeners
